snippet: A visit by Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan would antagonize the Palestinian Authority, Israel and the West.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan says he plans to visit the Gaza Strip, move that would significantly enhance legitimacy of the Hamas-controlled Gaza government and antagonize Palestinian Authority, Israel and the West.

byline.contributor: Tim Arango contributed reporting from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: A visit by Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan would antagonize the Palestinian Authority, Israel and the West.

headline.seo: Erdogan Says He Plans a Trip to Gaza Soon
headline.main: Turkish Leader Says He Plans a Trip to Gaza Soon
headline.print_headline: Causing a Stir, Turkish Leader Says He Plans A Trip to Gaza
